mutants.original_line: return [new_item if item == old_item else item for item in original_list]
mutants.mutated_line: return [new_item if item != old_item else item for item in original_list]
mutants.code:
def replace_item(original_list, old_item, new_item):
    return [new_item if item != old_item else item for item in original_list]
